verse: स ईक्षांचक्रे। कस्मिन्नहमुत्क्रान्त उत्क्रान्तो भविष्यामि कस्मिन् वा प्रतिष्ठिते प्रतिष्टस्यामीति ॥
meaning: स ईक्षांचक्रे।Overall meaning: He set his intent or desire in motion.कस्मिन्नहमुत्क्रान्त उत्क्रान्तो भविष्यामिOverall meaning: In what (thing or state) I have not transcended, I will transcend or go beyond.कस्मिन् वा प्रतिष्ठिते प्रतिष्टस्यामीतिOverall meaning: In what I have not established myself, I will establish myself.Translation: He set his intent in motion, in what (thing or state) I have not transcended, I will transcend or go beyond, and in what I have not established myself, I will establish myself.
